statements: SELECT * FROM Legislation
SELECT bill_name, sponsor_id FROM Legislation WHERE sponsor_id = 100
SELECT bill_id, bill_name FROM Legislation WHERE sponsor_id = 200 ORDER BY bill_name ASC
SELECT bill_name, co_sponsor_id FROM Legislation WHERE co_sponsor_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY co_sponsor_id DESC
SELECT * FROM Legislation WHERE sponsor_id = 300 OR co_sponsor_id = 400
SELECT * FROM Legislation WHERE bill_id = 10 ORDER BY bill_name DESC;
SELECT bill_name, sponsor_id FROM Legislation WHERE sponsor_id = 5 ORDER BY sponsor_id, bill_name;
SELECT bill_id, sponsor_id, co_sponsor_id FROM Legislation WHERE co_sponsor_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY bill_id;
SELECT * FROM Legislation WHERE sponsor_id = 3 AND co_sponsor_id = 7 ORDER BY bill_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT sponsor_id FROM Legislation WHERE bill_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY sponsor_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM bill_sponsors;
SELECT bill_id, sponsor_id FROM bill_sponsors WHERE bill_id = 1;
SELECT bill_id, COUNT(sponsor_id) AS sponsor_count FROM bill_sponsors GROUP BY bill_id;
SELECT DISTINCT bill_id FROM bill_sponsors ORDER BY bill_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM bill_sponsors WHERE sponsor_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY sponsor_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM bill_sponsors WHERE bill_id = 123;
SELECT DISTINCT bill_id, sponsor_id FROM bill_sponsors WHERE sponsor_id = 456 AND bill_id > 100;
SELECT bill_id, COUNT(sponsor_id) AS sponsor_count FROM bill_sponsors GROUP BY bill_id HAVING sponsor_count > 3;
SELECT DISTINCT bill_id, co_sponsor_id FROM bill_co_sponsors WHERE bill_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT bill_sponsors.bill_id, bill_co_sponsors.co_sponsor_id FROM bill_sponsors INNER JOIN bill_co_sponsors ON bill_sponsors.bill_id = bill_co_sponsors.bill_id;
SELECT * FROM legislators WHERE party = 'Republican';
SELECT name FROM legislators WHERE party = 'Democratic' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT bill_id, COUNT(*) AS total_sponsors FROM bill_sponsors GROUP BY bill_id HAVING total_sponsors > 1;
SELECT * FROM bill_co_sponsors WHERE co_sponsor_id = 1001;
SELECT legislator_id, name, party FROM legislators ORDER BY legislator_id ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT bill_id, sponsor_id FROM bill_sponsors WHERE bill_id = 1;
SELECT count(*) FROM bill_sponsors;
SELECT name, party FROM legislators ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM bill_co_sponsors WHERE co_sponsor_id IN (SELECT legislator_id FROM legislators WHERE party = 'Republican');
SELECT bill_id, COUNT(co_sponsor_id) AS num_co_sponsors FROM bill_co_sponsors GROUP BY bill_id HAVING num_co_sponsors > 5;
SELECT * FROM bills WHERE bill_id = 1
SELECT title, description FROM bills WHERE bill_id = 1
SELECT * FROM sponsors ORDER BY last_name DESC
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM sponsors WHERE email IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM bill_sponsors JOIN bills ON bill_sponsors.bill_id = bills.bill_id
SELECT * FROM sponsors
SELECT title, description FROM bills WHERE bill_id = 5
SELECT sponsor_id, first_name, last_name FROM sponsors ORDER BY last_name ASC
SELECT bill_id, sponsor_id, co_sponsor_id FROM bill_sponsors INNER JOIN bill_co_sponsors ON bill_sponsors.bill_id = bill_co_sponsors.bill_id
SELECT sponsor_id, COUNT(*) AS bill_count FROM bill_sponsors GROUP BY sponsor_id HAVING bill_count > 3
SELECT * FROM bill_sponsors;
SELECT bill_name, bill_description FROM bills WHERE bill_id = 1;
SELECT sponsor_name, organization FROM sponsors WHERE sponsor_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM bill_co_sponsors ORDER BY co_sponsor_name DESC;
SELECT sponsor_name, organization FROM co_sponsors WHERE organization LIKE '%Tech%';
SELECT * FROM bills WHERE bill_id = 123;
SELECT bill_id, bill_name, bill_description FROM bills WHERE bill_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT sponsor_name, organization FROM sponsors WHERE organization = 'Tech Inc';
SELECT * FROM bill_sponsors JOIN sponsors ON bill_sponsors.sponsor_id = sponsors.sponsor_id;

SELECT bill_name, sponsor_name, organization FROM bills JOIN bill_sponsors ON bill_sponsors.bill_id = bills.bill_id JOIN sponsors ON sponsors.sponsor_id = bill_sponsors.sponsor_id WHERE sponsor_name = 'Alice';
